name: Magic Holes
description:
Hello everyone! ATTENTION, sorry for that but I forgot to give you information about INPUT IN THE GAME you should use NUMPAD to play the game! Good luck!

This is is just like "Tablitsa Schulta" that people use to learn speed reading (I couldn't find translation of that in English, but you can search for that a bit if you want) . 

Guys, because I don't have any device that run on Mac or Linux now, there might be some problems on OSs. Sorry for that and I would be really happy if you would test this game on that operating systems if you use them. Please, let me know in comments!

I used:

Unity 2019.3

vectr.com

Visual Studio 2019
